function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relaxing constraints on social distancing in interior spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to closer proximity of individuals","Mitigation":"Enforce strict adherence to social distancing guidelines and limit the number of individuals in interior spaces","Technologies":"Monitoring systems, occupancy sensors, and education on social distancing","People":"Individuals using interior spaces, public health","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Use of multiple algorithms for optimization","Impact":"Inefficient or suboptimal seating arrangements that do not adequately account for social distancing","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough testing and validation of seating arrangements generated by different algorithms, and prioritize algorithms that emphasize social distancing","Technologies":"Optimization software, simulation tools, and data analysis","People":"Mathematicians, engineers, and public health experts","Owner":"Research institutions, development teams"},{"Description":"Storage and display of output data","Impact":"Potential privacy and security risks if sensitive data is not handled carefully","Mitigation":"Implement robust data privacy measures, encryption, and access controls for storage and display of output data","Technologies":"Encryption tools, secure storage systems, and access control mechanisms","People":"Data managers, IT professionals, and building managers","Owner":"Organizations responsible for data management and security"}]}
